channel.title: Dev on Fence
channel.description: Recent content in Dev on Fence

item.title: Frontend adventures - Level 1
item.description: The first version of the homepage is up 🎉! Current tools # mkdocs mkdocs-material theme took a lot of inspiration from the blowfish Hugo theme Mixed feeling # While this worked reasonably well for the homepage, my feeling is that it required a lot of custom code and I spent way too much time writing HTML and CSS. This is probably not what we want to do when adding content, but instead, work with Markdown as much as possible.
